Headline: Blue Line Service Delayed at Medical District
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are standing in both directions at Medical District due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are standing in both directions at Medical District due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

At this time, consider other alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
